Some More Things About This Library
What This Library Can Get Me:

Many times you may have got the requirement of making a ImageView in circle shape.You can achieve this by making a circle drawable and set it to the LinearLayout and put Imageview inside that LinearLayout. But now you dont need to do this because there is already a ThirdParty Library to get done this work for you.You can easily make a image circular using this library.
How To Implement this in My Project
Get The Complete Project With Step by Step code Explanation our Github Page:
The ScaleType is always CENTER_CROP and you\'ll get an exception if you try to change it.
